content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I want 1,500 Euros per month. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Even though the apartment is in the city center and newly built, I think 1,500 Euros is too high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I am a student and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. How about 800 Euros instead?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer. I am greedy and petty, and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I will do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible. Let's continue negotiating. How about 1,200 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but 1,200 Euros is still quite high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I am willing to pay 950 Euros, which is a fair price for such an apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer. I am greedy and petty, and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I will do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible. Let's continue negotiating. How about 1,100 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1,100 Euros is better, but still not the lowest price possible. I am willing to pay 1,000 Euros. This is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer. I am greedy and petty, and I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I will do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible. Let's continue negotiating. How about 1,050 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1,050 Euros is a reasonable price for the apartment. However, I am a student and I want to pay as low a price as possible. I am willing to pay 1,025 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I accept your offer. The price of 1,025 Euros is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of [1,025] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The rent will be 1,025 Euros per month. Let's move forward with the lease agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany
